title: ChAdOx1 nCoV-19 Corona Virus Vaccine (Recombinant): View Uses, Side Effects and Medicines | 1mg
cleaned_text: Vaccine (Recombinant) may show mild side effects like injection site tenderness or pain, headache, fatigue, myalgia (muscle pain), malaise, fever, chills, joint pain, and nausea. Very rarely, a few events of demyelinating disorders have been reported following vaccination with this vaccine but without the causal relationship establishment.
